title: [Celebration Hall, Patio]
description: Here tables are tucked into ivy-shrouded alcoves, with soft candlelight and the muted music from the ballroom creating an intimate atmosphere.  A gold and white sidebar stands laden with food, and a long white bar manned by a white-gloved bartender offers a variety of beverages.  A silver framed doorway leads into the ballroom.
